talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Geraint$
Let's go through the Forest of Little Shadows, to the Passage of Broken Recollections…
It must be there, I can smell him! Let's go!

$Geraint$
Let's go through the Forest of Little Shadows, to the Passage of Broken Recollections….
It must be there, I can smell him! Let's go!

$Geraint$
Hmph, why did he scatter his books like this?
(Geraint complains like he's annoyed. Go to the Passage of Broken Recollections.)

$Geraint$
Let's go!
(Go to the Passage of Broken Recollections)

$Geraint$
What are you waiting for? Read it now.
(Geraint seems eager to know the next story too. Read the red book which is open)

${user_nick}$
(…Read the part that is open. There really are words that didn't exist before…!)

*Cut scene will not be played if there is another party member who is carrying out another quest in the same map.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
.......

${user_nick}$
(……!)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
What's going on?? Where's Iona?? I made sure that my apparition would appear only when Iona finishes reading all my books!! (Rubinart shouts, stunned.)

${user_nick}$
Er... Maybe... Maybe it's because Iona gave me his powers…?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_05.ogg}
OU?!?! But you're not a Chaos Dragon! But why... Hey, come near! Let me see…
*Sniff sniff*(Rubinart sniffs you)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_06.ogg}
Wow it's true!! But why?? What's going on?? By the way, is that little boy an Ancient Dragon?! Why is an Ancient Dragon travelling with someone who has Iona's powers…? I wake up after a long time and this is the what I see... I'm at a loss for words…!!

${user_nick}$
Please relax… I'll tell you everything. Well, it started with…
(Tell him really everything, from Calderock Village to Saint Haven, Geraint's death, Lotus Marsh, Anu Arendel, Velskud, Argenta, and Geraint who's reborn, Iona, the Monolith, Feder, Meriendel...)

${user_nick}$
Er well… The adventurer from the future that Meriendel met was me. I was asked by Iona to take his power and help save the world… Iona gave all his powers to me and disappeared… (Rubinart's face becomes contorted after hearing that)

${user_nick}$
That's why I gathered everyone to fight Feder. Feder has completely changed from the days you knew him. He's trying to destroy this world and make a new one… He's the king of Dragon Followers... and he once colluded with Lunaria too... Now he's been injured by Argenta and no one knows where he is. I'm tracking him down now.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
….(Rubinart looks serious. Too serious and distressed… The air is so tense that Geraint stays still without saying a word)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_07.ogg}
…You're lying, aren't you…?

${user_nick}$
Huh?

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
This is a joke, isn't it? I can't believe Iona drifted around in his soul state... that Feder colluded with Lunaria, and that he's become an unreasonable fool who's trying to destroy this world…(Rubinart's voice is trembling)

${user_nick}$
…Well….

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_08.ogg}
I know that humans change! They all do!! But I thought Feder could be trusted. How can someone like him become completely different?!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_09.ogg}
How about Elizabeth who tried to protect Feder's dreams with her life? How about Meriendel who helped Feder even when she had to suppress her feelings? How about the hopes and dreams of the bunch of humans who followed and called him the Conqueror King?! How about... me? I did all that for him... why did he become like this!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_10.ogg}
What did I believe in all these years…? I… I gave half of my life to such a person…? And what? Silver Dragon died from Mistland's poison while she was trying to stop Feder? Haha this is insane. This whole world is insane! And the Goddess keeps on sleeping!! Seriously...

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_11.ogg}
WHAT KIND OF WORLD IS THIS!!!
(Rubinart's cry echos in the cave)

${user_nick}$
…(Since Feder I saw in the Monolith has been proven to be a real person from the past, not a figment of imagination, he must be the same Feder as the one who's trying to destroy the world… It must be a little hard for Rubinart to take it in since he used to be so close to him...)

${user_nick}$
…Erm, Rubinart…

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
But there's no reason for you to lie to me when we've only met today... Besides, you have Iona's powers. What you told me matches what I know about Meriendel too. Haha, this is crazy. It makes sense but my heart is trying to reject the reality. Oh... by the way, what is your name?

${user_nick}$
…It's {user_nick}.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:Talk}{sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_12.ogg}
{user_nick}, so you are the adventurer who gave Meriendel hope... Though we couldn't meet each other that time, I'm glad I have found you now. I would like to give you my sincerest gratitude, in the human way I like the most.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Hey, Geraint must think you're out of your mind!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
(Rubinart straightens his clothes and kneels down to kowtow... What? Kowtow???)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_13.ogg}
This is a rare chance for me to thank the person who saved my most precious woman from despair. You're Meriendel's saviour and my saviour too. I really sincerely thank you.(Rubinart says with his forehead pressed to the ground. He seems to be weeping a little too.)

${user_nick}$
Uh... I appreciate it very much. Please get up now.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_14.ogg}
As you wish. (As Rubinart stands up, you can feel how polite and well-mannered he is)
Thank you. It's you who saved Meriendel that time, not me, so you can boast about it all you want.
(Rubinart forces a smile to hide the sadness on his face)

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9566_qu_06.ogg}
What kind of a dragon is that…!!! Why are you kowtowing to someone like {user_nick}...!? You're one of the Chaos Dragons! You're corrupted!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_15.ogg}
(Rubinart scowls)How rude this Ancient Dragon is to someone he has met for the first time. Whether I'm corrupted or not, isn't it the right thing to be polite or repay gratitude? Is your uncontaminated jewel deficient of the most basic common sense called manners? Then how different are you from us, the corrupted ones? Stupid Ancient.

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9566_qu_07.ogg}
What did you just say…?!!!(Geraint is fuming)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_16.ogg}
Of course, I used to be a little rowdy when I was just born, but that was because I'm a Chaos Dragon. Even I managed to learn manners, why is an Ancient Dragon like you behaving that way? Don't the Ancient Dragons have the ability to learn? (Rubinart sneers at Geraint)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
I don't think a bad-mannered rascal like you who's rude to someone you've met for the first time or look down on your companion can ever learn such common sense. You are below us. No, you're worse than a human.

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9566_qu_08.ogg}
How dare you…!!!(Geraint seems really pissed off. He takes his sword out immediately.)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_17.ogg}
…Now a weapon?(Rubinart scoffs)
Go and learn some manners, you stupid Ancient Dragon!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…(Rubinart reaches his hand out towards Geraint. An ominous red light shines from his hand…!)

${user_nick}$
W-wait! This isn't a time for you to fight each other…!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_18.ogg}
…Close. (Rubinart twists his hand in a bizzare way)

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9566_qu_09.ogg}
..!! Argh!(Geraint falters and you quickly give him support, but he's surprisingly light. Rubinart sighs)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_19.ogg}
…I just put a spell on you so that you don't harm other people. Well, it's more of a curse rather than a spell. It would be hard for you to use your powers for a while, Ancient Dragon. You will only be able to use power that befits your current standard -- you've become weaker than humans.

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9566_qu_10.ogg}
Wh-what?!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_20.ogg}
…Looks like your powers made you too conceited. Why don't you go and cool your head for a while?
Get lost from my territory this instant. I have to talk to {user_nick} a little more, and I don't want a rude brat like you around.

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9566_qu_11.ogg}
Argh… (Geraint tries to protest but he barely has the strength to lift his own sword.)

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9566_qu_12.ogg}
…Damn it…!!
(He looks at you, almost on the verge of tears, and runs away like he's angry... It all happened so quickly that you had no time to catch him.)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_21.ogg}
…(Rubinart frowns like he's annoyed) That rude rascal! What's wrong with him? Why is he so messed up! If it wasn't for you, I would have chewed him down....!

${user_nick}$
Erm, Geraint is not even a year old…

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
No we shouldn't look at it that way, {user_nick}. Of course, we look different in our human forms depending on the type of power our jewels have. But we're not humans. Our personalities don't mature as we get older, they're fixed from the time we're born.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
For example, Iona is a scaredy cat and a crybaby. He seems a little better now judging from what you said earlier, but it's not like he'll grow up and one day say "Crying is for babies," and stop cry anymore. And that young Ancient... is his name Geraint? It's the same for him as well.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
That personality is just innate to him. But it is strange that his personality changed after he was reborn. Could something have happened during his resurrection? Or before he died?

${user_nick}$
…What? What do you mean…

$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:Talk}
There are rare cases where the dragon's appearance or peronality changes completely when reborn... Of course he wouldn't remember anything, but it usually happens when... hmm... he has something he terribly regrets.

${user_nick}$
…!!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Though we look like humans, we're actually more like tools. Ancient Dragon especially is specialised in fulfilling his mission, so maybe his personality could change to be more suitable in achieving his mission. Well, this is just a conjecture from a dragon who lacks a mission to fulfill.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Even if that's the nature of dragons...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Well, the conclusion is that even if you don't have that rascal tagging along, he would easily survive and become stronger on his own. So don't worry about him too much. By the way, his curse would be lifted soon too so never mind about him.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Ah… (Rubinart shakes his head) We are nothing but the tools of Gods. The Goddess created us to use us in protecting this world. Well, if you don't want to hear such things, I won't sat it. I guess Elves and humans alike don't like to hear such things...

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Anyway, you don't have to care so much about me when we've only just met... You really must be a good human, {user_nick}.
Now let's keep the gloomy stories aside and talk about where Feder might be.

${user_nick}$
…Oh, do you have any place in mind?

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
….(Rubinart looks around and says)This cave was prepared just for me by Feder. Though we are close to his castle, I can't feel Red Dragon's energy coming from there right now. By the way, did you say he was injured by Argenta?

${user_nick}$
…Yes, she took Black Dragon's jewel from him. He probably has half the Red Dragon jewel that you gave him right now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>This is the island that was mentioned in the books.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Then he must be at Ayrn. It's an island situated quite far away.
That's the only place he can recover the jewel's energy. Besides, that place is filled with my research works and it also has my nest. A perfect spot for Feder to recover.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…It's pretty far. I built my nest at a place where no one would come to disturb me.
But that doesn't mean that it's impossible to get there.

${user_nick}$
…Then if I go there and confirm that Feder really is there...!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:Talk}
It would take too long for you to go there and come back just to confirm whether he's there. It would take months for you. Feder can't become a dragon with half the jewel so you don't have to worry about the nest's barrier... Hmm, but I guess you should go there as quickly as you can if you want to fight him.

${user_nick}$
…(Feder's his old friend but he shows no reluctance in fighting him. Is it because he's a dragon?)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…Erm well, you would still need to confirm whether he's really there. I'll think alone for a while about the best way to check whether Feder's at Ayrn. Actually my head's in a mess after taking in too much information after waking up haha. (Rubinart forces a laugh)

${user_nick}$
…Then I'll go and get Geraint in the meantime. I'm worried about him after he left like that.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
(Rubinart shrugs)Wow you really care about that little rascal. That's why he thinks you're a pushover. Don't pamper him too much. I've never heard of a dragon being raised by a human.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…Even in our incomplete forms, we have power and a bit of knowledge too.
I'm sure he would blend in to the world well even without your help. But you're so... (Rubinart stares at you)

${user_nick}$
…Rubinart?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's not like I'm giving special treatment to Geraint.</html>
<html>Erm... If they're not hostile to me...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…Such a good human. I like you. You're not giving special treatment to Geraint, are you? Don't discriminate between dragons, got that? (Rubinart smiles teasingly)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9566_qu_22.ogg}
…All right, go on. You need to catch Feder…(Rubinart tries to smile... But his eyes aren't smiling. Leave the place.)
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

${user_nick}$
(I should go to Anu Arendel to find Geraint. I hope he's all right…)

qstep_change.comment: 맵에 트리거 작업 마구마구 할 것.
저널 4번은 제레인트 사라지고 트리거로 박아줄 것... 혹은 6스텝 첫단계에 넣던가.

journal.title: Twisted Fate 1
journal.contents:
Go to the Passage of Broken Recollections to find the next book.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Passage of Broken Recollections (Rubinart's Book)
journal.destination: To the Passage of Broken Recollections
journal.todo_msg: Quest has been added. Go to Passage of Broken Recollections and find Rubinart's Books.

journal.title: Twisted Fate 2
journal.contents:
The moment you finished reading the book, someone appeared. Is that Rubinart?!
Rubinart seems confused too. Talk to him first.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Passage of Broken Recollections (Red Dragon Rubinart)
journal.destination: Talk to Rubinart at the Passage of Broken Recollections
journal.todo_msg: Red Dragon Rubinart has appeared. Talk to him.

journal.title: Twisted Fate 3
journal.contents:
Rubinart wanted to sincerely thank {user_nick} for helping Meriendel get out of despair.
Talk to Rubinart a little more.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Passage of Broken Recollections (Red Dragon Rubinart)
journal.destination: Talk to Rubinart at the Passage of Broken Recollections
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Rubinart a little more.

journal.title: Twisted Fate 4
journal.contents:
Geraint got his power sealed after quarrelling with Rubinart and left in anger…
Talk to Rubinart a little more.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Passage of Broken Recollections (Red Dragon Rubinart)
journal.destination: Talk to Rubinart at the Passage of Broken Recollections
journal.todo_msg: Geraint left… Talk to Red Dragon Rubinart a little more.
